name: Indianapolis 500 Racing Simulation
short_description: Indianapolis 500 Racing Simulation: an accurate physics-based simulation, inspired by the 1989's Papyrus classic game. Remade to use OpenGL, and a highly realistic physics engine. Platforms: Windows, Linux, FreeBSD, ...
